news.title: 英国巧克力被锁进防盗盒，零售商称其为“订单式盗窃”
news.title0: Chocolate kept in anti-theft boxes as shops warn it's being stolen to order
news.content: 英国部分商店将巧克力棒锁入塑料防盗盒。零售商和警方警告称，窃贼正按“订单”盗窃巧克力，然后通过非法市场转售。
news.content0: Chocolate bars are being locked in plastic boxes in some UK shops as retailers and police forces warn thieves are stealing them to order.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 法国外长要求禁止美特使库什纳接触政府
news.title0: French minister moves to block US envoy Kushner from government access
news.content: 因美国特使查尔斯·库什纳未就法国暴力“上升”言论作出解释，法国外长要求禁止其直接接触政府部长，引发外交风波。
news.content0: The French foreign ministry says US envoy Charles Kushner should be blocked from access to the government after he failed to explain comments about an alleged "rise" in violence in France.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 俄士兵向BBC披露：曾目睹指挥官下令处决拒战同袍
news.title0: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
news.content: 四名俄罗斯士兵向BBC揭露前线残酷内幕，称曾目睹指挥官下令处决拒绝执行“自杀式”突击命令的士兵。
news.content0: Warning: This story contains details of extreme violence and reference to suicide.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普新关税生效，税率低于此前宣称
news.title0: Trump's new tariff comes into effect at lower than expected rate
news.content: 美国总统特朗普的新全球关税已生效，税率为10%，低于其此前宣称的15%。此举引发贸易伙伴国反弹担忧。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump's new global tariffs have come into effect at 10% despite a pledge to introduce them at a higher rate.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 《留级之王》男星罗伯特·卡拉丁去世，享年71岁
news.title0: Robert Carradine, Lizzie McGuire and Revenge of the Nerds star, dies aged 71
news.content: 美国演员罗伯特·卡拉丁去世，享年71岁。其家人称他因长期与双相情感障碍斗争后自杀，希望借此消除对精神疾病的污名。
news.content0: Robert Carradine, the US actor best known for roles in Revenge of the Nerds and Lizzie McGuire, has died aged 71.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 悉尼八旬老人被误绑遇害，警方寻获遗骸
news.title0: Police ask how Sydney grandpa was kidnapped and killed by mistake as remains found
news.content: 澳大利亚警方在悉尼郊外寻获人体遗骸，相信是近两周前被误绑的85岁老人克里斯·巴格萨里安。警方称此案极可能为身份误认。
news.content0: Australian police have found human remains in their search for a Sydney grandfather who they believe was kidnapped by mistake almost two weeks ago.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国动物园同日安乐死亲密动物伙伴
news.title0: Much-loved unlikely animal friends die on same day
news.content: 英国纽基动物园一只貘和一只水豚因年迈健康问题，被安排在同一天实施安乐死，以确保任何一方都不会在伴侣离世后感到孤独。
news.content0: A tapir and a capybara that had developed a strong bond were put to sleep on the same day so neither would be lonely.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 盲人攀岩者征服500英尺巨石
news.title0: ‘Giving fate the middle finger’: How blind climber Jesse Dufton scaled a 500-foot monolith
news.content: 盲人攀岩者杰西·达夫顿在妻子的语音引导下，成功登顶500英尺高的“斗牛士”岩壁，完成了一次非凡的挑战。
news.content0: As he climbed up the 500-foot rockface El Matador, wedging small pieces of metal into the rock in the hope they would catch his fall, Jesse Dufton was almost entirely alone.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 英国诞生首例死亡供体子宫移植婴儿
news.title0: 'Simply a miracle': Baby boy born from dead donor womb transplant in UK first
news.content: 英国首例通过死亡供体子宫移植诞生的男婴在伦敦医院降生，重约3.1公斤，被其母亲称为“奇迹”。
news.content0: A baby boy has become the first child in Britain to be born to a mother with a womb transplanted from a deceased donor.
news.author: Sky News
